summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 AVION AZURE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE GENERATOR FAILED TO OPERATE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO TRAILER REPAIR SHOP WHERE THE TECHNICIAN INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE GENERATOR WAS ON FIRE AND BURNT AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 05/11/13*LJ  THE CONSUMER STATED THE GENERATOR WAS REPAIRED ON APRIL 8, 2016. UPDATED 09/07/16.*JB
